title: kalpakAmbikA
sahitya:
kalpakAmbikA ramaNa kapAli karuNai purindaruLvAi shrI


anupallavi

  tol bhava shuzhalilE shikki shuzhanru nondu manam tuDikkudE shrI


caraNam    dikkut dishai ellAm tEDiyaluttEn tiruvaDi tuNai enrunnai aDuttEn
irakkamODabam aLittenaik-kAttaruL rAmadAsan pOTrum tirumayilaik-
